Analysis Task: Which year had the highest average Horsepower?

spec.description: Which year had the highest average Horsepower?
spec.title: Which year had the highest average Horsepower?

correct: The year 1970 had the highest average horsepower of 147.83.
incorrect1: The year 1980 had the highest average horsepower of 77.48.
incorrect2: The year 1973 had the highest total horsepower of 5219.0.
incorrect3: The year 1970 had the highest average horsepower.
